clusterTrack

Identification of use-sites from animal movement tracks using spatiotemporal segmentation and adjacency-based spatial clustering

clusterTrack provides a clustering-based framework for identifying recurring use-sites in animal movement tracks with complex spatiotemporal structure. It is designed for data with irregular sampling, noise, long temporal gaps, and fragmented revisitation patterns, where movement models and purely spatial clustering often perform poorly.

remotes::install_github('ornitho-logics/clusterTrack')
remotes::install_github('ornitho-logics/clusterTrack.Vis')
